verses.name: Acts 22:11
verses.text: And when I could not see for the glory of that light, being led by the hand of them that were with me, I came into Damascus.

verses.name: Acts 22:12
verses.text: And one Ananias, a devout man according to the law, having a good report of all the Jews which dwelt there,

verses.name: Acts 22:13
verses.text: Came unto me, and stood, and said unto me, Brother Saul, receive thy sight. And the same hour I looked up upon him.
